author: Anita Jesse
content: If I thought that buying the Topaz and Snap Art plug-ins would ensure my producing images comparable to yours, I would have to lock up my credit cards before viewing your site. Fortuntately, I know that the embellishments provided by the programs aren't the essential ingredients of your work. Still I admit that I am tempted. Is the silver tone from Topaz, or is it applied after you are done with the plug in?
